name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: AHAHAHA. No. Well, depends on the genre and the game. For the most part, team-based multiplayer is LESS casual-friendly  because your team (probably made up of randoms) has a good chance of being toxic, especially if you're not good, or if said random is a tryhard.

source_obj.text: AHAHAHA. No. Well, depends on the genre and the game. For the most part, team-based multiplayer is LESS casual-friendly  because your team (probably made up of randoms) has a good chance of being toxic, especially if you're not good, or if said random is a tryhard.

replies.text: Some games (like DOTA nd CSGO) are notorious for their toxicity. On the other hand, 1v1 pvp you only have yourself to rely on and blame.
